Setting Up the StarTeam Microsoft Project integration

To set up Microsoft Project so that it can interoperate with StarTeam, you must open the StarTeam.mpp file that comes with StarTeam Microsoft Project Integration and run an installation macro. Following this procedure places a StarTeam menu item on the Microsoft Project menu bar.

To integrate with Microsoft Project:

  1. Start Microsoft Project.

  2. Select File > Open from the Microsoft Project menu bar.

  3. Locate and open the StarTeam.mpp file. The StarTeam.mpp file can be found in the folder in which you installed StarTeam Microsoft Project Integration (usually C:\Program Files\Borland\StarTeam\Integrations\StarTeam Microsoft Project Integration). This action displays the Microsoft Project dialog.

  4. Click Enable Macros.

  5. Select Tools > Macro > Macros from the Microsoft Project menu. The Macros dialog appears.

  6. Select StarTeam.mpp!Install from the Macros list, then click Run. The StarTeam Task Integration dialog appears.

  7. Click Yes. This action adds a StarTeam menu to the Microsoft Project menu bar, immediately to the right of the Help menu.

  8. Select File > Close to close the StarTeam.mpp file. Do not save changes to this file as it is a read-only file.

  9. Open a new or existing Microsoft Project (.mpp) file of your own.
